title: HAP 02 - It’s Only Human - Philosophy in Prehistoric Africa
itunes:title: HAP 02 - It’s Only Human - Philosophy in Prehistoric Africa
description: Might philosophy be as old as humankind as we know it? We investigate the implications of findings concerning the origins of humankind in Africa.
